hero.name: Rakhmanberdi Izbassar
hero.heading: Hi! I’m Rakhmanberdi
hero.description: I specialize in crafting intuitive digital experiences. With strong expertise in Laravel, React, and Django, I build scalable and secure web applications tailored to client needs.

about.title: I AM AVAILABLE FOR FULL-STACK DEVELOPMENT PROJECTS
about.description: I am a graduate in Digital Management and Design, with practical experience in web and mobile app development. My focus areas include Laravel, React, and Django, complemented by a strong interest in cybersecurity and IoT solutions.

details.title: Tourism and Hotel Booking Web Application
details.description: Qaztour is a web-based platform that showcases Kazakhstan's tourist destinations and allows users to book hotels and tours. It also includes features for guides, travel packages, and multi-language support for international visitors.

details.title: FAQ Content Management for Bilim.app
details.description: I contributed to enriching the FAQ section of Bilim.app — a national-level educational platform. This involved organizing and presenting information in a user-friendly and accessible manner.

allService.title: Full-Stack Development
allService.subTitle: Building scalable web applications using Django, Laravel, and React.

allService.title: UI/UX Design
allService.subTitle: Crafting intuitive and user-centered interface designs.

allService.title: Cybersecurity Advisory
allService.subTitle: Basic security audits and best practice implementation.

allExperience.companyDescription: Bilim.app is a national educational platform of Kazakhstan aimed at improving access to digital learning tools across the country. My role involved managing and enhancing the FAQ section.

sectionHeading.title: Let’s Discuss Your Project
sectionHeading.subTitle: Always open to new collaborations in tech, feel free to reach out.
